official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require inclusion of the taxpayer's social security number to claim the refundable portion of the child tax credit.
short_title: Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act of 2021

summary.text:
Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act of 2021

This bill requires taxpayers who are claiming the refundable portion of the child tax credit to include their Social Security account number on their tax returns.
